title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.6 - Ton (when used with reference to cargo or merchandise, except when otherwise specified)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.6 - Ton (when used with reference to cargo or merchandise, except when otherwise specified)

State Regulations

Two thousand pounds weight, 2,240 pounds weight or 40
cubic feet measurement, at the option of the Port Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1243.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
